医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
新的 3D 身体扫描方法在追踪身体脂肪方面优于传统成像研究人员开发了一种使用 3D 身体形状来预测身体成分的新方法，为传统医学成像提供了更方便的替代方案。这种方法可以准确跟踪脂肪量随时间的变化。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241025/New-3D-body-scan-method-beats-traditional-imaging-for-tracking-body-fat.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241025/New-3D-body-scan-method-beats-traditional-imaging-for-tracking-body-fat.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=259129e8-1a8a-4eda-929b-edb9d1fefebc Fri, 25 Oct 2024 00:21:00 -0400 New 3D body scan method beats traditional imaging for tracking body fat
审查发现，口罩和智能座椅可降低航班上的 COVID-19 风险航空旅行审查显示，SARS-CoV-2 存在零星传播，佩戴口罩和座位距离是感染​​风险的关键。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241024/Masks-and-smart-seating-cut-COVID-19-risks-on-flights-review-finds.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241024/Masks-and-smart-seating-cut-COVID-19-risks-on-flights-review-finds.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=fa4611ce-0a9c-4152-b735-ddef1a0d7e2c Thu, 24 Oct 2024 23:59:00 -0400 Masks and smart seating cut COVID-19 risks on flights, review finds
研究人员揭示了为什么 TP53 基因特别容易在癌症中发生突变脆弱的 TP53 基因突变会损害 p53 的肿瘤抑制功能，使其比其他肿瘤抑制因子更脆弱。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241024/Researchers-uncover-why-the-TP53-gene-is-special-prone-to-mutations-in-cancer.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241024/Researchers-uncover-why-the-TP53-gene-is-special-prone-to-mutations-in-cancer.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=d8815846-d881-4b92-844c-62189a92549a Thu, 24 Oct 2024 23:40:00 -0400 Researchers uncover why the TP53 gene is especially prone to mutations in cancer
每天使用互联网可以增强您的记忆力！频繁使用互联网与情景记忆的改善有关，日常用户在记忆任务中比不经常使用互联网的人表现得更好。该研究表明，随着时间的推移，数字参与可能会增强认知能力。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241024/Daily-internet-use-supercharges-your-memory!.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241024/Daily-internet-use-supercharges-your-memory!.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=a2667657-25df-409d-b5a7-81b36051feb3 Thu, 24 Oct 2024 23:17:00 -0400 Daily internet use supercharges your memory!
研究发现少数族裔患者拒绝疫苗的可能性较小在新冠病毒大流行期间，媒体广泛报道称，黑人患者比白人患者更有可能拒绝接种疫苗，包括流感疫苗和新冠疫苗。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241024/Study-finds-minority-病人-less-likely-to-refuse-vaccines.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241024/Study-finds-minority-病人-less-likely-to-refuse-vaccines.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=c6a4ae6a-9e3b-45bb-bbd1-ee7c40e219b8 Thu, 24 Oct 2024 22:58:06 -0400 Study finds minority patients less likely to refuse vaccines
每日食用开心果与改善眼睛健康有关塔夫茨大学弗里德曼营养科学与政策学院的研究人员进行的一项新研究发现，每天食用开心果可以通过增加黄斑色素光密度（MPOD）来显着改善眼睛健康，因为植物色素叶黄素是保护眼睛的关键因素。眼睛免受蓝光（可见光）和与年龄相关的损伤。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241024/Daily-pistachio-conspiration-linked-to-improved-eye-health.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241024/Daily-pistachio-conspiration-linked-to-improved-eye-health.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=e9141283-8753-446d-866f-5ff71114844d Thu, 24 Oct 2024 22:55:07 -0400 Daily pistachio consumption linked to improved eye health
美国国立卫生研究院 (NIH) 新拨款支​​持利用创新技术进行婴儿发育研究婴儿睡眠模式和情绪调节对于健康发育很重要，但实时了解婴儿行为具有挑战性。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241024/New-NIH-grants-support-research-on-infant-development-with-innovative-technology.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241024/New-NIH-grants-support-research-on-infant-development-with-innovative-technology.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=93a2722a-df2f-4b15-934a-36be03311433 Thu, 24 Oct 2024 22:51:15 -0400 New NIH grants support research on infant development with innovative technology
研究强调中风护理质量改进计划的重要性本月发表的新研究表明，质量改进计划在确保医院能够充分应对我国面临的最大公共卫生威胁之一：中风方面发挥着关键作用。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241024/Research-highlights-importance-of-quality-improvement-programs-in-中风-care.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241024/Research-highlights-importance-of-quality-improvement-programs-in-中风-care.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=86b92500-7d3f-43f0-94db-aedbd95ce389 Thu, 24 Oct 2024 22:47:55 -0400 Research highlights importance of quality improvement programs in stroke care
癌细胞中发现的与 WRN 抑制剂耐药性相关的关键突变研究人员在某些癌细胞中发现了关键突变，这些突变使它们对 WRN 抑制剂（一种新型抗癌药物）产生耐药性。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241024/Key-mutations-discovered-in-cancer-cells-linked-to-WRN-inhibitor-resistance.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241024/Key-mutations-discovered-in-cancer-cells-linked-to-WRN-inhibitor-resistance.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=1ed61c12-1b9b-476d-b0a5-a6d60745f588 Thu, 24 Oct 2024 22:41:42 -0400 Key mutations discovered in cancer cells linked to WRN inhibitor resistance
研究人员解码 MRSA 生物膜结构以对抗抗生素耐药性想象一下因感染而患重病。通常情况下，我们会去看医生，服用抗生素，7-10 天后，我们就会恢复正常。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241024/Researchers-decode-MRSA-biofilm-struct-to-combat-antibiotic-resistance.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241024/Researchers-decode-MRSA-biofilm-struct-to-combat-antibiotic-resistance.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=f397d80b-f4dc-484a-bae7-104f607d6fd2 Thu, 24 Oct 2024 22:35:25 -0400 Researchers decode MRSA biofilm structure to combat antibiotic resistance
